DOC.brief_title: An Exploratory Trial Investigating Neurogenic Component Psoriasis Vulgaris Use Botulinum Toxin A
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year A diagnosis psoriasis vulgaris lesion locate arm and/or legs and/or trunk Chronic stable psoriasis vulgaris diagnose 6 month prior screen . Women must use reliable contraceptive trial . Pregnant breast feed woman , woman plan become pregnant . Skin infection injection site Use biological therapy small molecule ( market market ) possible effect psoriasis vulgaris Use systemic treatment potential effect psoriasis vulgaris Exposure phototherapy within 4 week PUVA 2 week UVB prior Randomisation Use potent potent ( WHO group IIIIV ) corticosteroids topical treatment psoriasis within 4 week period prior randomisation Use muscle relaxant History dysphagia aspiration Current diagnosis guttate , erythrodermic , exfoliative pustular psoriasis
